extendedInfo.description: Relax MusicBox is a music box that will help you relax with soothing music and brings peace to our hearts.When trying to sleep,When trying to relax,When you try to study,When you try to de-stress,Or when you want ...- 8 hours and 45 minutes of relaxation.- 100 images that will run every 20 seconds with very beautiful landscapes.- Really a gift that should not stop having plus is totally free!To download the sounds must access the application menu and select "Download Music"The sounds are composed of:Â Â  Audio 1 - 1 hour and 22 minutesÂ Â  Audio 2 - 1 hour 48 minutesÂ Â  Audio 3 - 1 hour and 37 minutesÂ Â  Audio 4 - 1 hour and 33 minutesÂ Â  Audio 5 - 2 hours and 22 minutesDo not forget to rate the application.Kindly send us an email with your comments or suggestionsWe hope you enjoy it!Permissions required:Â  - Permission for phone calls is to automatically pause the music when a call comes.Â  - Permission is network communication for advertising.Â  - The storage permit is to download the sounds

reviews.comment: Beautiful photos but music only plays for a few seconds. The little music I do hear sounds relaxing....
reviews.author: Mz. Bea

reviews.title: Nice idea but no sound
reviews.comment: Installed it on my Droid Razr Maxx just fine but I get no sound. The pictures are nice and they cycle through as advertised. Also, once it supposedly starts \"playing\" the touch controls are inoperable. When I try and press on \"shuffle\" the app crashes. Supposed to be compatible with my device. Must be an \"alpha\" version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I love this app. Beautiful music and pictures. Thankyou.
reviews.author: Caroline Hampton

reviews.title: Uh...
reviews.comment: The audio isn\'t working at all. Everything else works like a charm.
reviews.author: Gamzee Makara
